data.title: Basketball news
data.text:
Cole signed a 1+1 contract with the lithuanian club last summer

Robinson comes from a two-year stint with the Miami Heat.

The Knicks have everything in place to remain at the top of the Eastern Conference next season

Huff will replace Trey Jamison, who was just released by the Grizzlies.

Andrew Nembhard has reached an agreement with the Indiana Pacers for a three-year contract extension at $59 million

Ryan Hawkins could be about to join Stade Rochelais for next season’s Betclic ÉLITE

Future in New Zealand for Freddie Gillespie. The former Bayern Munich and Red Star has signed a two-year deal with the New Zealand Breakers

Chimezie Metu has reached an agreement with Barcelona, as reported by Evan Sidery of Forbes Sports

Olimpia Milan has reached an agreement with Fabien Causeur, a 1.96 mt tall guard, born on 16 June 1987 in Brest, France, coming from Real Madrid

Maccabi Playtika Tel Aviv has announced the signing of Rokas Jokubaitis for the next three seasons

Chima Moneke denies rumours of a farewell to Baskonia in the direction of Partizan. Tough stance on X

Ignas Brazdeikis returns to Žalgiris Kaunas on a two-year contract, after playing with Olympiacos in 2023-2024

Baskonia is following Luka Samanic: the long Croatian could return to Europe and make his EuroLeague debut next season.

Barcelona, Chimezie Metu shot on the way: the Nigerian center has reportedly reached an agreement for his arrival to the Blaugrana club.

Baskonia has announced the arrival of Donta Hall: the center, back from her adventure in Monaco, has signed a two-year contract.

Panathinaikos, official renewal of coach Ergin Ataman: he will remain at the helm of the Greens for a long time yet.

Partizan Belgrade is ready for the big blow: Chima Moneke, a long player who played for Baskonia last season, is on his way.

Paris Basketball, after Kevarrius Hayes here is Daulton Hommes: the arrival of the former Dolomiti Energia Trentino player is official.

Serbian shooter Danilo Andjusic has left Partizan Belgrade and signed with Dubai BC, where he will play in the ABA Liga.

Paris Basketball announced the arrival of center Kevarrius Hayes, a player returning from his experience at Zalgiris Kaunas.

Germany has chosen its flag bearer for the 2024 Paris Olympics: point guard Dennis Schroder.

The power forward remains in Israel after an excellent first season in Europe with Hapoel Haifa

Carroll headed to Poland after a good year in BBL

Jackson ended the last regular season with 10.1 points and 3.7 assists in 22 minutes per game.

Serbia will play the first game of Group C in Lille against Team USA on July 28 at 5:15 p.m.

Andjusic spent the last two years with Partizan

Last year Shorter produced 14.9 points, 5.1 rebounds and 3.9 assists per game.

Reese headed to Turkey after a great year in VTB League

Fabien Causeur, after seven successful seasons at Real Madrid, is now in the details with Olimpia Milano

Polish forward averaged 6.2 points last Aba League season with Partizan
